Text.Page:
Valkyon Federation Headquarters Operation Orders Eliminate {@LinkCreature:47#3001$$contaminated wendigo}

Mission Details: {@Rgn:47004$$Blightroar} in {@Rgn:47001$$Tirkai Forest}.

Operation Target: {@LinkCreature:47#3001$$contaminated wendigo}, {@LinkCreature:47#3002$$argonomorph wendigo}, and {@LinkCreature:47#3003$$argonomorph wendigo shaman}.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
